content: वृकः [<ls>Uṇ. 3. 41</ls>] {@--1@} A wolf; पापारंभकयोर्मृगीव वृकयोर्भीरुर्गता गोचरं <ls>Māl. 5. 24.</ls> {@--2@} A hyena. {@--3@} A jackal. {@--4@} A crow. {@--5@} An owl. {@--6@} A robber. {@--7@} A Kṣatriya. {@--8@} Turpentine. {@--9@} A compound perfume, a mixture of various fragrant articles. {@--10@} <ab>N.</ab> of a demon. {@--11@} <ab>N.</ab> of a tree (बकवृक्ष). {@--12@} <ab>N.</ab> of a fire in the stomach. {@--13@} A plough. {@--14@} The moon (<ab>Ved.</ab>).
